metadata.title: Peach Couture Women's Midi Multicolor Exotic Smocked Spring Summer Dress
features: New by Peach Couture Beautiful Maxi Bodice Dress in Paisley Design
Minimal yet chic & Trendy, this bodice style maxi dress features an ornate paisley print and elasticized smocked waist.
Flat sandals and a floppy sunhat make the perfect pair to this flowy ensemble.
Its delicate tank straps let you bare your sun-kissed shoulders, and its relaxed fit is just want you're looking for on sunny days.
Measurements: Medium- 24" Bustline, 26" Waist, 44" (Laid Flat) Hips, 12" Shoulder Straps, 36" Total Length; Large 26" Bustline, 28" Waist, 45" (Laid Flat) Hips, 14" Shoulder Straps, 38" Total Length
description: New by Peach Couture. Peach Couture is a registered Trademark. Stylish and classy, this maxi tank colorful dress with a paisley design is perfect for you special occasion or any day that you feel to be fancy and beautiful! This dress is absolutely great for all seasons, whether you want it to look casual but bright during summer, or lighten up your winter days! It features a scoop neckline, V style back, and an elastic waistband to accentuate the curves of your body. Long and flowing, the maxi tank dress is beautifully designed for you to look excellent. Measurements: Medium- 24" Bustline, 26" Waist, 44" (Laid Flat) Hips, 12" Shoulder Straps, 36" Total Length; Large 26" Bustline, 28" Waist, 45" (Laid Flat) Hips, 14" Shoulder Straps, 38" Total Length
